extensionDescription.message: Opens selected bug numbers in Bugzilla, and optionally in GitHub and Jira.

contextMenuItem.description: Title of parent context menu item when more than one type is enabled.

contextMenuItemB.description: Title of single context menu item that opens the selected text as bugs in Bugzilla when clicked (and no GitHub repos or Jira instances are specified).

contextMenuItemJ.description: Title of single context menu item that opens the selected text as items in Jira when clicked (and no GitHub repos or Bugzilla instances are specified).

contextMenuItemG.description: Title of single context menu item that opens the selected text as issues in GitHub when clicked (and no Bugzilla or Jira instances are specified).

contextMenuItemB+.description: Title of context submenu item that opens the selected text as bugs in Bugzilla when clicked (and another option exists).

contextMenuItemJ+.description: Title of context submenu item that opens the selected text as item in Jira when clicked (and another option exists).

contextMenuItemG+.description: Title of context submenu item that opens the selected text as bugs in GitHub when clicked (and another option exists).
